docs.snippet: BALTIMORE, Wednesday, Sept. 19, 1860 P.M. Our citizens are quite anxious to know officially,  and with certainty, whether His Royal Highness the Prince of Wales will visit Baltimore.

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN BALTIMORE.; Waiting for the Prince Political Prospects New Gas Company, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: BALTIMORE, Wednesday, Sept. 19, 1860 P.M. Our citizens are quite anxious to know officially, and with certainty, whether His Royal Highness the Prince of Wales will visit Baltimore.

docs.snippet: The area of ground which is inclosed by a ten-foot fence, for the Eighth Annual Fair of the United States Agricultural Society, is as extensive as that of many an Eastern farm. Great Societies must make colossal preparations, and have extraordinary...

headline.main: THE UNITED STATES FAIR.; Extent of the Grounds Cincinnati Behind Chicago Why the Fair is held at Cincinnati The Opening Ceremonies The Visitors.

docs.lead_paragraph: The area of ground which is inclosed by a ten-foot fence, for the Eighth Annual Fair of the United States Agricultural Society, is as extensive as that of many an Eastern farm. Great Societies must make colossal preparations, and have extraordinary space to work in; and hence it was thought by the Cincinnati people that the sixty acres of the trotting park was none too large for the National Agricultural Show.

docs.snippet: To the Prince of Wales:  The citizens of Buffalo, understanding that your Royal Highness contemplates visiting some portions of the United States, have appointed a Committee to invite you, if convenient, to take Buffalo in your route.

headline.main: THE PRINCE'S TOUR IN THE STATES.; HIS ROYAL HIGHNESS PASSES BY BUFFALO. THE ARRANGEMENTS IN WASHINGTON. THE PROGRAMME IN DETROIT. THE PROGRAMME IN BOSTON.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Prince of Wales: The citizens of Buffalo, understanding that your Royal Highness contemplates visiting some portions of the United States, have appointed a Committee to invite you, if convenient, to take Buffalo in your route.
